import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import './spiritDataActions.css' const DepartmentDataEdit = () => { const [dept_name, set_dept_name] = useState('') const [dept_image, set_dept_image] = useState('') const navigate = useNavigate() const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { getDepartmentById() }, []) const getDepartmentById = async () => { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8000/api/departments/${id}`) set_dept_name(response.data.dept_name) set_dept_image(response.data.dept_image) } const updateDepartment = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.patch(`http://localhost:8000/api/departments/${id}`, { dept_name, dept_image, gold_medal_count, silver_medal_count, bronze_medal_count }) navigate('/admin/department') } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return (

UPDATE DEPARTEMEN

set_dept_name(e.target.value)} placeholder='Nama Departemen' />
set_dept_code(e.target.value)} placeholder='Kode Departemen' />
set_dept_image(e.target.value)} placeholder='Gambar Departemen' />
set_gold_medal_count(e.target.value)} placeholder='Jumlah Mendali Emas' />
set_silver_medal_count(e.target.value)} placeholder='Jumlah Mendali Perak' />
set_bronze_medal_count(e.target.value)} placeholder='Jumlah Mendali Perunggu' />
) } export default DepartmentDataEdit
